text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa finishes the race with<n>incredible
results.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She shows no signs of fatigue, so I<n>recommend
that she run in the Japanese<n>Derby next.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Finally blessed with an opportunity to<n>race
against her classmates, El Condor<n>Pasa is more
energetic than ever.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
And it seems the feeling is mutual for<n>Special
Week. Both of them face the<n>coming race with
hearts ablaze.
